ds2.1.1:9.1: Kāyapassaddhi → kāyappassaddhi (sya-all) | cittapassaddhi → cittappassaddhi (sya-all) | kāyujukatā → kāyujjukatā (bj, pts-vp-pli1, mr) | cittujukatā → cittujjukatā (bj, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ds2.1.1:25.2: vīriyārambho → viriyārambho (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | ussoḷhī → ussoḷhi (bj, pts-vp-pli1) | vīriyabalaṁ → viriyabalaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
ds2.1.1:45.2: adussanā adussitattaṁ → adūsanā adūsitattaṁ (sya-all) | abyāpajjo → avyāpajjho (bj); abyāpajjho (cck); avyāpajjo (pts-vp-pli1)
ds2.1.1:52.2: paṭipassaddhi → paṭippassaddhi (bj, sya-all) | paṭipassambhanā → paṭippassambhanā (bj, sya-all) | paṭipassambhitattaṁ → paṭippassambhitattaṁ (bj, sya-all)
